metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5815 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow error within the "parse_qt()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can beexploited to trigger an infinite loop via a specially crafted AppleQuickTime file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
